ICBC.details: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited (ICBC) is the world's largest bank by assets and one of the 'Big Four' state-owned commercial banks in China. It provides a wide range of financial products and services, including commercial banking, investment banking, asset management, and insurance.

JPMorgan Chase.details: JPMorgan Chase & Co. is a leading global financial services firm with operations in investment banking, asset management, commercial banking, consumer banking, and more. Berkshire Hathaway.details: Berkshire Hathaway is a multinational conglomerate holding company headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska. It is known for its investment prowess under the leadership of Warren Buffett, who is considered one of the most successful investors of all time.

China Construction Bank.details: China Construction Bank Corporation (CCB) is a state-owned commercial bank headquartered in Beijing, China. It is one of the "Big Four" state-owned commercial banks in China, and is the world's second-largest bank by market capitalization.

Saudi Arabian Oil Company (Saudi Aramco).details: Saudi Aramco, officially the Saudi Arabian Oil Company, is a Saudi Arabian multinational petroleum and natural gas company headquartered in Dhahran. It is the world's largest oil company by production and revenue.

Apple.details: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that specializes in consumer electronics, software, and online services. Founded in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne, Apple is headquartered in Cupertino, California.

Bank of America.details: Bank of America is a leading financial institution providing a wide range of banking, investment, and wealth management services to individuals, businesses, and governments worldwide. The company operates in over 35 countries and employs over 100,000 people.

Ping An Insurance Group.details: Ping An Insurance Group is a Chinese multinational financial conglomerate headquartered in Shenzhen, Guangdong. It offers a wide range of financial products and services, including life and health insurance, property and casualty insurance, banking, asset management, and technology. Ping An is one of the largest insurance companies in the world, with a global presence.

Agricultural Bank of China.company_details: Agricultural Bank of China is one of the largest commercial banks in China, providing a comprehensive range of financial services to individuals, businesses, and institutions.

Amazon.company_details: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company that focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It is one of the Big Five companies in the American technology sector, alongside Alphabet, Apple, Meta, and Microsoft.

Samsung Electronics.details: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. is a South Korean multinational electronics company headquartered in Samsung Town, Seoul. It is the world's largest information technology company by revenue and the largest manufacturer of smartphones, televisions, and memory chips. Samsung has an extensive portfolio of consumer electronics products, including smartphones, tablets, computers, televisions, appliances, and more.

Toyota Motor.company_details: Toyota Motor Corporation is a multinational automotive manufacturer headquartered in Toyota, Aichi, Japan. It is the world's largest automaker by production and sales, known for its reliable and fuel-efficient vehicles.

Alphabet.company_details: Alphabet Inc. is a multinational technology conglomerate holding company. It was formed in 2015 as a restructuring of Google Inc., and it owns a diverse range of businesses, including search, advertising, cloud computing, hardware, and software. The company's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

Bank of China.company_details: Bank of China is one of the largest state-owned commercial banks in China, offering a wide range of financial services including commercial banking, investment banking, and asset management. It has a global network with branches and subsidiaries in over 50 countries.

Microsoft.company_details: Microsoft is a multinational technology corporation that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. The company's best-known software products are the Microsoft Windows line of operating systems, the Microsoft Office suite, and the Internet Explorer and Edge web browsers.

Citigroup.details: Citigroup Inc. is a multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in New York City. It offers a wide range of financial products and services to individuals, corporations, and governments worldwide, including banking, investment, insurance, and asset management.

Volkswagen Group.company_details: Volkswagen Group is a German multinational automotive manufacturer headquartered in Wolfsburg, Lower Saxony, Germany. It is one of the world's largest automobile manufacturers by production, as of 2022, with over 12 brands including Volkswagen, Audi, Bentley, Bugatti, Lamborghini, Porsche, SEAT, Škoda, and more.

Walmart.details: Walmart Inc. is an American multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores. Founded in 1962, it's the world's largest company by revenue.

Wells Fargo.details: Wells Fargo & Company is an American multinational financial services company headquartered in San Francisco, California. It is one of the largest banks in the United States, offering a wide range of financial products and services to individuals, businesses, and institutions.

Verizon Communications.details: Verizon Communications is an American multinational telecommunications conglomerate headquartered in New York City. UnitedHealth Group.details: UnitedHealth Group is a leading American health care and insurance company, offering a wide range of health benefits, insurance products, and health care services. China Merchants Bank.company_details: China Merchants Bank is a major Chinese commercial bank headquartered in Shenzhen. It was founded in 1987 and is one of the largest joint-stock commercial banks in China, known for its comprehensive financial services and innovative products.

Alibaba Group.company_details: Alibaba Group is a Chinese multinational technology company specializing in e-commerce, retail, Internet, and technology. It was founded in 1999 by Jack Ma and is headquartered in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China.

Allianz.company_details: Allianz is a leading global insurance and asset management company with operations in over 70 countries. Comcast.details: Comcast Corporation is an American multinational mass media and telecommunications conglomerate headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Goldman Sachs Group.details: Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in New York City.  It provides a wide range of financial services to corporations, governments, and individuals worldwide.

Softbank.company_details: SoftBank Group Corp. is a Japanese multinational conglomerate holding company headquartered in Tokyo. It invests in various sectors, including technology, media, telecommunications, and finance. Its notable investments include Alibaba, Yahoo Japan, and ARM Holdings.

Postal Savings Bank Of China (PSBC).company_details: The Postal Savings Bank of China (PSBC) is a state-owned commercial bank headquartered in Beijing, China. Tencent Holdings.details: Tencent Holdings is a multinational technology conglomerate headquartered in Shenzhen, China. China Mobile.details: China Mobile is the world's largest mobile telecommunications company by subscribers, offering a wide range of services including voice, data, and mobile broadband. It is headquartered in Beijing and operates in over 200 countries and regions.

Facebook.company_details: Meta Platforms, Inc., formerly known as Facebook, Inc., is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Menlo Park, California. Johnson & Johnson.company_details: Johnson & Johnson is an American multinational corporation that develops and sells a wide range of healthcare products, including pharmaceuticals, medical devices, consumer healthcare products, and medical diagnostics.

Sony.details: Sony Corporation is a Japanese multinational conglomerate corporation headquartered in Kunitachi, Tokyo. General Electric.details: General Electric (GE) is a multinational conglomerate headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts. Procter & Gamble.company_details: Procter & Gamble is a multinational consumer goods corporation headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, United States. Home Depot.company_details: The Home Depot, Inc. is an American home improvement retailer, operating a chain of over 2,300 retail stores in the United States, Canada, and Mexico. It is the world's largest home improvement retailer, with over 400,000 employees.

Shanghai Pudong Development.company_details: Shanghai Pudong Development Bank Co., Ltd. (SPDB) is a major Chinese joint-stock commercial bank headquartered in Shanghai. Zurich Insurance Group.company_details: Zurich Insurance Group is a global insurance company headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland. Intesa Sanpaolo.details: Intesa Sanpaolo is a leading Italian banking group, offering a wide range of financial services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. Merck & Co..details: Merck & Co., Inc., known as MSD outside the United States and Canada, is a global pharmaceutical company headquartered in Kenilworth, New Jersey. HDFC Bank.details: HDFC Bank is one of India's leading private sector banks, offering a wide range of financial products and services to individuals and businesses. Telef\u00f3nica.details: Telefónica is a multinational telecommunications company headquartered in Madrid, Spain. Danone.company_details: Danone is a multinational food-products corporation headquartered in Paris, France. The company specializes in dairy products, bottled water, and plant-based foods. Power Corp of Canada.details: Power Corporation of Canada is a Canadian multinational financial services company headquartered in Montreal, Quebec. Mastercard.details: Mastercard is a multinational financial services corporation that operates a global payments processing network. It provides a wide range of services including credit, debit, prepaid, and commercial cards, as well as digital payment solutions.

Baidu.details: Baidu, Inc. is a Chinese multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products, with a focus on artificial intelligence (AI). Dow.details: Dow Inc. is a multinational chemical corporation that produces a wide range of products, including plastics, chemicals, agricultural products, and materials science solutions. It is headquartered in Midland, Michigan, USA.

Archer Daniels Midland.details: Archer Daniels Midland Company (ADM) is a global agricultural processing and commodities trading company. Shinhan Financial Group.details: Shinhan Financial Group is a South Korean financial services company offering banking, insurance, securities, and asset management services. ASML Holding.company_details: ASML Holding is a Dutch multinational corporation specializing in the production of lithography machines, essential equipment for the manufacturing of integrated circuits. Founded in 1984, ASML is a global leader in the semiconductor industry.

Becton Dickinson.details: Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD) is a global medical technology company that develops, manufactures, and sells a wide range of medical devices, diagnostic systems, and other healthcare products. Gree Electric Appliances.details: Gree Electric Appliances is a Chinese multinational manufacturer of home appliances, primarily known for its air conditioners. LafargeHolcim.details: LafargeHolcim is a global leader in building materials and solutions. It operates in over 70 countries, employing over 70,000 people. China Railway Group.company_details: China Railway Group Limited (CREC) is a Chinese state-owned construction and engineering company specializing in infrastructure projects, particularly railways. It is headquartered in Beijing and is a major player in China's Belt and Road Initiative.

Automatic Data Processing.company_details: Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (ADP) is a leading provider of human capital management (HCM) solutions, serving more than 100 million people worldwide. NVIDIA.company_details: NVIDIA is a multinational technology company specializing in graphics processing units (GPUs) and related technologies.  Founded in 1993, NVIDIA's products are used in gaming, professional visualization, artificial intelligence, and more.

KBC Group.details: KBC Group is a Belgian multinational financial services company, providing banking, insurance, and asset management services to individuals and businesses. They offer a range of products, including loans, mortgages, savings accounts, investment products, and insurance policies.

Royal Ahold Delhaize N.V..company_details: Royal Ahold Delhaize N.V. is a Dutch multinational retail company headquartered in Zaandam, Netherlands. Sun Hung Kai Properties.details: Sun Hung Kai Properties Limited (SHKP) is a Hong Kong-based multinational conglomerate specializing in real estate development, investment, and property management. Novo Nordisk.company_details: Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company headquartered in Denmark, specializing in diabetes care, obesity, hemophilia, and growth hormone therapy. Huaxia Bank.company_details: Huaxia Bank is a commercial bank headquartered in Beijing, China. Established in 1996, it is one of the largest joint-stock commercial banks in the country, offering a wide range of financial services including retail banking, corporate banking, and investment banking.

Kweichow Moutai.details: Kweichow Moutai is a Chinese state-owned liquor company specializing in the production of Moutai, a strong Chinese baijiu. Poste Italiane.details: Poste Italiane is a leading Italian postal and financial services company. It provides a wide range of services including mail delivery, logistics, financial products, and digital solutions. The company has a vast network and plays a crucial role in the Italian economy.

ViacomCBS.details: ViacomCBS is an American mass media conglomerate headquartered in New York City. Bank Of Shanghai.details: Bank of Shanghai is a major commercial bank headquartered in Shanghai, China. Adobe.details: Adobe is a multinational computer software company that specializes in multimedia and creativity software products, digital marketing solutions, and document management services. BCE.details: BCE Inc. is a Canadian telecommunications company headquartered in Montreal, Quebec. It offers a wide range of telecommunications services including wireless, internet, television, and home phone services. The company serves over 10 million customers across Canada.

Couche Tard.details: Couche-Tard is a Canadian multinational convenience store operator and largest convenience store operator in the world, with over 16,000 stores in North America, Europe, and Asia. Saudi Telecom.details: Saudi Telecom Company (STC) is a leading telecommunications provider in Saudi Arabia. Bank of Ningbo.details: Bank of Ningbo is a Chinese commercial bank headquartered in Ningbo, Zhejiang province. It offers a wide range of banking services, including commercial banking, retail banking, investment banking, and asset management.

CaixaBank.details: CaixaBank is a Spanish multinational financial services company, one of the largest financial institutions in Spain. IntercontinentalExchange.details: Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. (ICE) is a leading global provider of data, technology, and market infrastructure.  ICE operates a broad range of regulated exchanges, clearing houses, and over-the-counter (OTC) markets for financial and commodity instruments.

Surgutneftegas.details: Surgutneftegas is a Russian oil and gas company headquartered in Surgut, Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug. Deutsche Bank.details: Deutsche Bank is a German multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in Frankfurt, Germany. AT&T.details: AT&T Inc. is an American multinational telecommunications holding company. Marsh & McLennan.details: Marsh & McLennan Companies is a global professional services firm specializing in risk, strategy, and human capital. Ameriprise Financial.details: Ameriprise Financial, Inc. is a leading financial services company that provides a wide range of financial products and services to individuals and businesses. ExxonMobil.details: ExxonMobil is an American multinational oil and gas corporation headquartered in Irving, Texas. Freddie Mac.details: Freddie Mac is a government-sponsored enterprise (GSE) that provides liquidity to the mortgage market by purchasing and securitizing mortgages. Vivendi.details: Vivendi is a French multinational mass media and telecommunications conglomerate headquartered in Paris. The Saudi National Bank.details: The Saudi National Bank (SNB) is Saudi Arabia's largest bank by assets, offering a wide range of financial services to individuals and businesses. It plays a key role in the country's economic development, supporting various sectors.

CRH.details: CRH plc is a global building materials company headquartered in Dublin, Ireland. Tata Consultancy Services.details: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is an Indian multinational information technology (IT) services and consulting company headquartered in Mumbai, India. Philips.details: Royal Philips, commonly known as Philips, is a Dutch multinational conglomerate headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. Royal Dutch Shell.details: Royal Dutch Shell plc is a multinational oil and gas company headquartered in the Netherlands. It is one of the world's largest companies by revenue, and is vertically integrated, meaning it is involved in all aspects of the oil and gas industry, from exploration and production to refining and marketing.

Stryker.company_details: Stryker is a leading medical technology company that specializes in orthopedic, medical and neurotechnology products and services. They offer a wide range of innovative solutions to meet the needs of healthcare professionals and patients worldwide.

Etisalat.details: Etisalat is a leading telecommunications company headquartered in the United Arab Emirates. Etisalat is a major player in the global telecommunications industry, with operations in several countries across the Middle East, Africa, and Asia.

Mitsui Fudosan.company_details: Mitsui Fudosan is a Japanese real estate company headquartered in Tokyo. It is one of the largest real estate developers in the world, with a focus on commercial, residential, and retail properties. It also engages in asset management and urban development projects.

Daiwa House Industry.details: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. is a leading Japanese construction company specializing in residential housing, commercial buildings, and industrial facilities. Daiwa House offers a wide range of services, including land development, architectural design, and construction management.

Shin-Etsu Chemical.details: Shin-Etsu Chemical Co., Ltd. is a Japanese multinational chemical company headquartered in Tokyo. Daikin Industries.details: Daikin Industries, Ltd. is a Japanese multinational corporation headquartered in Osaka, Japan. CSX.details: CSX Corporation is a major American railroad company headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida. The company operates over 21,000 miles of track in 23 states and two Canadian provinces. Lennar.details: Lennar is a leading homebuilder in the United States, known for its diverse range of homes, communities, and customer-focused approach. LyondellBasell Industries.details: LyondellBasell Industries is a global chemical company headquartered in the Netherlands. Swiss Life Holding.details: Swiss Life Holding AG is a leading Swiss insurance and financial services company, headquartered in Zurich. The company operates in various markets worldwide and has a strong focus on individual and corporate clients.

Chevron.details: Chevron Corporation is an American multinational energy corporation headquartered in San Ramon, California. The company is engaged in exploration, production, refining, marketing, and transportation of oil and natural gas. General Mills.company_details: General Mills is a multinational food company headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States. Newmont Mining.details: Newmont Corporation is a leading gold producer with a global portfolio of assets. They operate mines in North and South America, Africa, and Australia.  They are committed to responsible mining practices and environmental sustainability.

China Railway Construction.details: China Railway Construction Corporation Limited (CRCC) is a Chinese state-owned enterprise specializing in infrastructure construction, particularly railways, bridges, tunnels, and urban rail transit. Haier Smart Home.details: Haier Smart Home is a leading global provider of smart home appliances and solutions. Haier Smart Home is committed to providing innovative and high-quality products that enhance the lives of its customers.

Anhui Conch Cement.company_details: Anhui Conch Cement is a leading cement producer in China, specializing in the production and distribution of various types of cement, clinker, and other building materials. It is known for its large-scale operations, advanced technology, and commitment to environmental sustainability.

Discover Financial Services.details: Discover Financial Services is a financial services company that offers credit cards, banking products, and other financial services. It is known for its Discover card, which offers cash back rewards and other benefits.

Texas Instruments.company_details: Texas Instruments (TI) is a global semiconductor company headquartered in Dallas, Texas. DNB.details: DNB Bank ASA, commonly known as DNB, is a Norwegian multinational financial services corporation headquartered in Oslo. It is the largest financial services group in Norway, offering banking, insurance, asset management, and other financial services to individuals and businesses.

Total.details: TotalEnergies SE, previously known as Total S.A., is a multinational integrated energy company headquartered in Courbevoie, France. Nintendo.details: Nintendo Co., Ltd. is a Japanese multinational video game and entertainment company headquartered in Kyoto. Fortescue Metals Group.details: Fortescue Metals Group is an Australian iron ore mining company headquartered in Perth, Western Australia. It is one of the world's leading manufacturers of agricultural machinery, construction equipment, and engines. The company also manufactures water treatment systems, environmental equipment, and other industrial products.

Shimao Property Holdings.details: Shimao Property Holdings Limited is a Chinese real estate development company headquartered in Shanghai. It is known for its high-end residential projects, commercial developments, and property management services.

CK Asset Holdings.details: CK Asset Holdings Limited is a Hong Kong-based multinational conglomerate engaged in real estate development, infrastructure, and energy. The company, formerly known as Cheung Kong Holdings, has a diverse portfolio encompassing residential and commercial properties, infrastructure projects, and energy investments worldwide.

Bank of Nanjing.company_details: Bank of Nanjing is a Chinese commercial bank headquartered in Nanjing, Jiangsu. It is one of the largest commercial banks in China, with a wide range of banking services, including commercial banking, retail banking, investment banking, and wealth management. The bank has a strong presence in Jiangsu province and expanding its operations nationwide.

Edp-energias De Portugal.details: EDP - Energias de Portugal, SA is a Portuguese multinational electric utility company. It is one of the largest electricity companies in the world and operates in over 20 countries. The company is involved in all aspects of the electricity value chain, including generation, transmission, distribution, and retail.  EDP is headquartered in Lisbon, Portugal.

LukOil.details: Lukoil is a Russian multinational vertically integrated energy company headquartered in Moscow. It is one of the world's largest oil and gas producers, with operations in over 20 countries. The company is involved in exploration, production, refining, marketing, and distribution of oil and gas.

Sany Heavy Industry.details: Sany Heavy Industry is a Chinese multinational heavy machinery manufacturing company based in Changsha, Hunan, China. It specializes in construction equipment, such as excavators, cranes, and concrete machinery. The company is known for its large-scale operations and its focus on innovation and technology.

Grupo Mexico.company_details: Grupo México is a Mexican multinational corporation headquartered in Mexico City. It is one of the largest mining companies in the world, with operations in copper, gold, silver, zinc, lead, and other metals. The company also has interests in infrastructure, transportation, and energy.

Michelin Group.company_details: Michelin is a French multinational tire manufacturer headquartered in Clermont-Ferrand, France. It is known for its high-quality tires and innovative technologies, and is the world's second-largest tire manufacturer. Michelin also operates in other industries, including travel guides, maps, and hotel and restaurant ratings. The company's products are sold in over 170 countries.

Komatsu.details: Komatsu Ltd. is a Japanese multinational corporation headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. It is one of the world's largest manufacturers of construction, mining, and forestry equipment. The company also manufactures industrial machinery, including forklifts, excavators, bulldozers, and dump trucks.

NetEase.details: NetEase, Inc. is a Chinese internet technology company headquartered in Hangzhou, Zhejiang. It is known for its online gaming, music streaming, and educational services. NetEase is one of China's largest internet companies and has a significant global presence.

Asahi Group Holdings.details: Asahi Group Holdings, Ltd. is a Japanese multinational alcoholic beverage and food company headquartered in Tokyo. It is the world's fifth-largest brewer and a leading producer of soft drinks, tea, and coffee. The company's portfolio includes iconic brands such as Asahi Super Dry beer,  and more.

SK Telecom.details: SK Telecom is South Korea's largest mobile telecommunications company, providing mobile, fixed-line, internet, and IPTV services. It is also a leading player in 5G, artificial intelligence, and the Internet of Things. SK Telecom is known for its innovative services and technologies, such as its T-World platform, which provides a wide range of digital content and services.

Air Products & Chemicals.details: Air Products & Chemicals, Inc. is a global leader in industrial gases, chemicals, and related technologies. The company produces a wide range of gases, including oxygen, nitrogen, hydrogen, and helium. Air Products also manufactures and supplies chemicals, such as ammonia, methanol, and ethylene oxide. The company has a strong focus on sustainability and environmental responsibility.

Athene Holding.details: Athene Holding Ltd. is a Bermuda-based life and retirement insurance company, specializing in retirement solutions. The company provides a range of products and services, including fixed and variable annuities, life insurance, and retirement planning. Athene Holding Ltd. has a strong financial position and a track record of growth.

eBay.details: eBay is a multinational e-commerce corporation that facilitates online auctions and shopping. Founded in 1995 by Pierre Omidyar, it connects buyers and sellers globally. Its core business is online auctions, but it also offers fixed-price sales and a variety of other e-commerce services.

Freeport-McMoRan.details: Freeport-McMoRan Inc. is a leading international mining company with a focus on copper, gold, and molybdenum. It operates mines and projects in North and South America, Indonesia, and Africa. The company is committed to responsible mining practices and sustainable development.

Power Construction Corporation of China.details: Power Construction Corporation of China (POWERCHINA) is a state-owned enterprise specializing in infrastructure construction, power generation, and engineering services. It is a global leader in hydropower, with projects in over 100 countries.

LG Chem.details: LG Chem is a South Korean multinational chemical company headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. It is a subsidiary of LG Group and is one of the world's leading manufacturers of petrochemicals, advanced materials, and batteries.  The company is also a major producer of plastics, synthetic rubber, and electronic materials.

Saudi Basic Industries.details: Saudi Basic Industries Corporation (SABIC) is a global leader in the chemical industry, producing a wide range of products, including plastics, fertilizers, and metals. It is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and has operations in over 50 countries.

Bouygues.details: Bouygues is a French multinational construction company specializing in construction, civil works, telecommunications, and media. Founded in 1952 by Francis Bouygues, it is headquartered in Paris, France. Bouygues is known for its large-scale infrastructure projects and its diverse portfolio across various industries.

Citizens Bank (Rhode IsIand).details: Citizens Bank, headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, is a regional bank with a presence in 14 states. The bank offers various financial services to individuals and businesses, including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, credit cards, and wealth management.

Capgemini.details: Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, technology, and outsourcing services. It provides a wide range of services including digital transformation, cloud computing, data analytics, and cybersecurity. Capgemini is committed to innovation and sustainability, and it is ranked among the top employers in the world.

Edison International.details: Edison International is an American energy company that generates, transmits, and distributes electricity to customers in California. It is the parent company of Southern California Edison, one of the largest electric utilities in the United States. The company is committed to providing safe, reliable, and affordable energy to its customers while investing in renewable energy sources and advancing clean energy technologies.

Magna International.details: Magna International is a leading global automotive supplier, headquartered in Aurora, Ontario, Canada. The company designs, develops, manufactures, and assembles automotive systems, modules, and components for original equipment manufacturers (OEMs). Magna's expertise spans a wide range of automotive technologies, including body exteriors and interiors, powertrain systems, seating, and electronics.

Dollar Tree.details: Dollar Tree, Inc. is a discount retailer operating over 16,000 stores in North America. They offer a wide variety of products, including home goods, party supplies, toys, and food, all priced at $1.25 or less. Dollar Tree is known for its low prices, offering value to budget-conscious shoppers.

Telenor.details: Telenor is a Norwegian multinational telecommunications company headquartered in Oslo, Norway. It is one of the largest mobile phone operators in the world with operations in Europe, Asia, and Africa.  The company provides a wide range of telecommunication services, including mobile, fixed-line, broadband, and television. Telenor is known for its strong commitment to sustainability and social responsibility.

China Zheshang Bank.details: China Zheshang Bank is a commercial bank headquartered in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China. Established in 1996, the bank specializes in corporate banking, retail banking, and investment banking services. It has a vast network of branches across China.

Entergy.details: Entergy Corporation is an American electric utility holding company headquartered in New Orleans, Louisiana. It provides electricity to millions of customers in Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, and Texas. Entergy also operates nuclear power plants and natural gas pipelines.

Lam Research.company_details: Lam Research Corporation is a leading supplier of wafer fabrication equipment and services to the semiconductor industry. The company offers a wide range of products and services, including deposition, etching, cleaning, and metrology equipment. Lam Research is headquartered in Fremont, California, and has operations around the world.

Infosys.details: Infosys is a global leader in consulting, technology, and outsourcing solutions. Headquartered in Bengaluru, India, the company provides a wide range of services, including digital transformation, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.  Infosys has a strong global presence with over 160,000 employees serving clients in various industries.

The Est\u00e9e Lauder Companies.company_details: The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. is a multinational manufacturer and marketer of prestige skincare, makeup, fragrance, and hair care products.  The company owns a diverse portfolio of brands including Estée Lauder, Clinique, MAC Cosmetics, and La Mer.

China Tower Corp..details: China Tower Corporation is a state-owned company that operates and maintains telecommunications infrastructure in China. It is the world's largest tower company, owning and operating over 1.9 million towers. China Tower was established in 2014 as a merger of three major tower companies, China Telecom Tower, China Mobile Tower, and China Unicom Tower.

Corteva.details: Corteva, Inc. is an American agricultural science company formed in 2019 through the spin-off of DowDuPont's agriculture division. It specializes in seed, crop protection, and digital agriculture solutions. Corteva is headquartered in Wilmington, Delaware, and operates in over 140 countries.

CSL.details: CSL Limited is a global biopharmaceutical company headquartered in Melbourne, Australia. They specialize in the development, production, and distribution of life-saving medicines and therapies. CSL was founded in 1916 and is a leading player in the plasma-derived therapies, vaccines, and immunotherapies sectors.

Safran.details: Safran is a French multinational aerospace company that specializes in aircraft propulsion, aircraft equipment, and defense systems. It is a global leader in the aerospace industry, with a presence in over 70 countries.

Banorte.details: Banorte is a leading financial institution in Mexico, offering a comprehensive range of financial products and services to individuals and businesses. These include banking, insurance, investment, and wealth management solutions. With a strong focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Banorte strives to empower its clients with financial tools and support.

KeyCorp.details: KeyCorp is a US-based financial services company offering banking, investment, and insurance products. It serves individuals, businesses, and institutions through various channels, including branches, online, and mobile banking. KeyCorp is headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, and operates across the US.

Lufax Holding.details: Lufax Holding Co., Ltd. is a Chinese financial technology company headquartered in Shanghai. The company provides online wealth management, consumer finance, and small and medium-sized enterprise (SME) lending services. It operates through various subsidiaries, including Lufax, which focuses on wealth management and insurance, and CreditEase, which provides lending services. Lufax Holding is listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

Swedbank.details: Swedbank is a leading financial institution in the Nordic region, offering a wide range of banking and financial services to individuals and businesses. The company is known for its strong brand reputation and commitment to sustainability.

Constellation Brands.company_details: Constellation Brands is a leading multinational alcoholic beverage company headquartered in Victor, New York. It specializes in beer, wine, and spirits.  The company was founded in 1945 and has a diversified portfolio of popular brands including Corona, Modelo, Ballast Point, Robert Mondavi, Clos du Bois, and SVEDKA.

Nidec.company_details: Nidec Corporation is a Japanese multinational corporation specializing in electric motors and related products. Founded in 1973, Nidec is a global leader in electric motor technology, serving a wide range of industries, including automotive, consumer electronics, and industrial automation. The company has a diverse portfolio of products and technologies, including high-performance motors, control systems, and power electronics.

Naspers.details: Naspers is a multinational internet and media group headquartered in South Africa. It is known for its early investments in companies like Tencent, Mail.ru Group, and MakeMyTrip. Naspers has a vast portfolio of online businesses across various sectors, including e-commerce, food delivery, classifieds, and online payments.

Vonovia.details: Vonovia SE is a German real estate company that owns and manages residential properties. It is one of the largest residential real estate companies in Europe, with a portfolio of over 400,000 residential units in Germany, Austria, and Sweden.

Activision Blizzard.details: Activision Blizzard, Inc. is an American video game holding company headquartered in Santa Monica, California. The company develops and publishes video games, including popular franchises such as Call of Duty, World of Warcraft, and Candy Crush.

Bank Mandiri.details: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk, commonly known as Bank Mandiri, is a state-owned commercial bank in Indonesia. It is the largest bank in Indonesia by assets and is one of the largest banks in Southeast Asia. Bank Mandiri offers a wide range of banking products and services to individuals, businesses, and institutions.

Marathon Petroleum.details: Marathon Petroleum Corporation is an American petroleum refining, marketing, and transportation company headquartered in Findlay, Ohio. It is the largest refiner in the United States and a leading producer of gasoline, diesel fuel, and jet fuel. The company operates refineries in eight states, as well as pipelines, terminals, and retail gasoline stations.

Illinois Tool Works.details: Illinois Tool Works Inc. (ITW) is a Fortune 200 global diversified manufacturing company. It operates in various industries, including food equipment, welding, automotive, construction, and electronics. ITW focuses on providing engineered solutions and specialized components through a decentralized business model.

Eversource Energy.details: Eversource Energy is a public utility holding company that provides electricity and natural gas to customers in Massachusetts, Connecticut, and New Hampshire. The company is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts.

Parker-Hannifin.details: Parker-Hannifin Corporation is a Fortune 250 company and a global leader in motion and control technologies. The company designs, manufactures, and sells a wide range of components and systems for industrial, aerospace, and other markets. It operates in over 50 countries.

S.F. Holding.details: S.F. Holding Company is a privately held investment firm specializing in real estate, hospitality, and technology.  Founded in 2010, the company has a portfolio of diverse assets across multiple industries. S.F. Holding is committed to long-term value creation and strategic partnerships.

NTPC.details: NTPC Limited is India's largest power generation company, responsible for a significant portion of the country's electricity production. It operates a diverse portfolio of thermal, hydro, and renewable energy plants across India. NTPC is a public sector undertaking under the Ministry of Power, Government of India.

Transneft.details: Transneft is a Russian state-owned oil pipeline company responsible for transporting crude oil and petroleum products within Russia and to international markets. It operates the largest pipeline network in the world, transporting over 80% of Russia's oil exports.

Stanley Black & Decker.details: Stanley Black & Decker is a Fortune 500 company and a leading global provider of tools and storage, security, and infrastructure solutions. The company operates in over 60 countries and employs over 50,000 people worldwide. Its iconic brands include Stanley, Black & Decker, DeWalt, Craftsman, and Irwin.

Rongsheng Petrochemical.details: Rongsheng Petrochemical is a leading integrated petrochemical company in China. The company specializes in refining, petrochemicals, and olefins production. It is headquartered in Zhejiang province and has a strong presence in the domestic market. Rongsheng is committed to sustainable development and environmental protection.

Denso.details: Denso Corporation is a Japanese multinational automotive components manufacturer headquartered in Kariya, Aichi. It is the world's second-largest automotive supplier, focusing on advanced automotive technology, powertrain systems, thermal systems, safety systems, and electronics.

Gilead Sciences.company_details: Gilead Sciences, Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company that develops, manufactures, and commercializes medicines in areas of unmet medical needs. Its main therapeutic areas include HIV/AIDS, viral hepatitis, oncology, inflammatory and autoimmune diseases, and cardiovascular diseases.

Swiss Re.details: Swiss Re is a global reinsurance company headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland. They provide reinsurance, insurance and other insurance-based forms of risk transfer. They have a global presence with offices in over 25 countries.

Swisscom.details: Swisscom is a leading telecommunications company in Switzerland, providing a wide range of services including mobile, fixed-line, internet, and television. They are also a major player in the IT and digitalization sectors. Committed to innovation and sustainability, Swisscom empowers its customers with cutting-edge technologies and reliable services.

Nutrien.details: Nutrien is a global leader in agricultural inputs, providing farmers with essential products and services like fertilizers, crop protection, and seed. The company is committed to sustainable agriculture practices and aims to enhance global food security.

M&G.details: M&G is a leading international asset management company, offering a wide range of investment products and services to individual and institutional investors globally. The company has a long history in the industry, with roots dating back to the 19th century.

Cognizant.details: Cognizant is a multinational technology solutions and consulting company headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, USA.  It provides a wide range of services, including digital transformation, cloud computing, data analytics, and cybersecurity.  The company has a global presence with offices in over 40 countries and employs over 300,000 people.

Vestas Wind Systems.details: Vestas Wind Systems A/S is a Danish wind turbine manufacturer headquartered in Aarhus, Denmark. It is the world's largest manufacturer of wind turbines, with a market share of around 40%. The company designs, manufactures, installs, and services wind turbines for onshore and offshore applications.

JBS.details: JBS S.A. is a Brazilian multinational food processing company. It is the world's largest producer of beef and pork and the second-largest poultry producer. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil. JBS operates in over 15 countries and employs over 250,000 people worldwide.

Soci\u00e9t\u00e9 G\u00e9n\u00e9rale.details: Société Générale is a French multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in Paris. It is one of the largest banks in the Eurozone and a major player in global banking, with operations in over 60 countries. Société Générale provides a wide range of financial services, including retail banking, investment banking, asset management, and insurance.

Ageas.details: Ageas is a global insurance group, headquartered in Belgium. They offer a wide range of insurance products and services, including life, non-life, health, and pensions. They are present in over 50 markets worldwide, with a strong focus on Europe and Asia.

NEC.details: NEC Corporation is a Japanese multinational technology and electronics company headquartered in Minato, Tokyo. It specializes in information technology, network systems, and electronic devices. NEC was founded in 1899 as the "Nippon Electric Company, Limited".

Adidas.details: Adidas AG is a German multinational corporation that designs and manufactures footwear, apparel, and accessories. It is the largest sportswear manufacturer in Europe and the second largest in the world, after Nike.

Novatek.details: Novatek is a leading Russian independent natural gas producer. It operates across the entire gas value chain, from exploration and production to processing and marketing. The company is a major supplier of natural gas to the European market and is also developing projects to produce liquefied natural gas (LNG).

PPG.details: PPG Industries, Inc. is an American multinational manufacturer of paints, coatings, and specialty materials. Headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, PPG operates in over 70 countries and employs approximately 46,000 people worldwide. The company's products are used in a wide range of industries, including automotive, aerospace, industrial, and consumer markets.

NatWest Group.details: NatWest Group is a British multinational banking and financial services company headquartered in London. It is one of the largest financial institutions in the United Kingdom, offering a wide range of financial products and services to individuals, businesses, and institutions.

Wanhua Chemical Group.company_details: Wanhua Chemical Group is a leading global manufacturer of MDI, TDI, and other chemical products. It has a wide range of applications in construction, automotive, and other industries. The company has a strong focus on research and development, and is committed to sustainable production practices.

FirstRand.details: FirstRand is a leading financial services group in South Africa, offering banking, insurance, investment, and wealth management services to individuals and businesses. It operates across a diverse range of brands including FNB, RMB, and WesBank.

Aptiv.details: Aptiv is a global technology company that develops and manufactures advanced safety, power, and connectivity solutions for the automotive industry. It was formed in 2017 following the spin-off of Delphi Automotive's powertrain business. Aptiv's key areas of expertise include autonomous driving, vehicle electrification, and digital cockpit systems.

Subaru.details: Subaru is a Japanese automaker known for its all-wheel-drive vehicles and performance-oriented cars. Founded in 1953, Subaru is headquartered in Tokyo and known for its popular models like the Impreza, Outback, Forester, and WRX.

Erste Group Bank.details: Erste Group Bank is a leading financial services provider in Central and Eastern Europe. It offers a wide range of banking products and services, including retail banking, corporate banking, investment banking, and asset management. The bank is headquartered in Vienna, Austria, and operates in 7 countries.

Aeon.details: Aeon is a leading Japanese retail company specializing in general merchandise, supermarkets, and convenience stores. They operate a vast network of stores across Japan, offering a wide range of products, services, and shopping experiences. Aeon strives to provide customers with value, convenience, and quality.

T&D Holdings.details: T&D Holdings, Inc. is a global insurance holding company based in Japan.  The company specializes in life and non-life insurance, with operations in Japan, Asia, Europe, and North America.  It was founded in 2000 and is publicly traded on the Tokyo Stock Exchange.

ArcelorMittal.details: ArcelorMittal is a multinational steel and mining company headquartered in Luxembourg. It is the world's largest steel producer, with operations in over 60 countries and a workforce of approximately 180,000 employees. The company produces a wide range of steel products, including flat rolled products, long products, and steel pipes. It is also a major producer of iron ore and coal.

Northern Trust.details: Northern Trust is a global financial services company that provides investment management, asset servicing, and banking services to corporations, institutions, and individuals. They specialize in wealth management, asset servicing, and investment management.

Metallurgical Corp of China.company_details: Metallurgical Corporation of China (MCC) is a state-owned enterprise that specializes in engineering, procurement, and construction services for mining, metallurgy, infrastructure, and power projects. Founded in 1953, MCC has established a global presence with operations in over 60 countries.

MediaTek.details: MediaTek Inc. is a Taiwanese fabless semiconductor company that designs and manufactures integrated circuits for wireless communications, consumer electronics, and networking devices. Known for its expertise in mobile, connectivity, and smart home technologies, MediaTek empowers a wide range of devices.

Orsted.details: Ørsted is a Danish energy company specializing in offshore wind energy. It was founded in 1971 as DONG Energy, then changed its name to Ørsted in 2017. The company is committed to achieving carbon neutrality by 2040 and has a strong focus on sustainable development.

Toshiba.details: Toshiba Corporation is a Japanese multinational conglomerate headquartered in Tokyo. It is a leading provider of electronic equipment, including consumer electronics, computers, and industrial systems.  The company was founded in 1875 as Tokyo Electric Light Company.

McKesson.details: McKesson Corporation is a global healthcare company specializing in pharmaceutical and medical-surgical supplies, technology, and distribution services. Founded in 1833, McKesson connects healthcare providers, payers, pharmaceutical manufacturers, and patients. They offer a wide range of products, services, and technologies to optimize the healthcare supply chain and improve patient outcomes.
